## US Gender Pay Gap Visualisation
US Gender Pay Gap Visualisation Made with [Vegalite](https://vega.github.io/vega-lite/).
Data source: [tidytuesday](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-03-05/jobs_gender.csv).
